trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.
trans-unit.target: 用于扩展支持嵌套的组件的根设计文档的设计模式行为的基本设计器类。

trans-unit.source: ComponentDocumentDesigner provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components.
trans-unit.target: ComponentDocumentDesigner 支持嵌套的组件的根设计文档的设计器提供基类。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, ComponentDocumentDesigner implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components.
trans-unit.target: 除了的方法和功能从继承<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>类，ComponentDocumentDesigner 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>接口，以提供根级别设计模式视图关联的组件和任何嵌套组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The root-level design mode view for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is typically provided by a built-in root designer.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的根级别设计模式视图<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>通常由内置根设计器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>实现需要为其他类型的根组件在设计模式下提供视图。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将使用一种<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>的类型关联的设计器

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取设计器的控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> the designer is editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>编辑设计器。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否支持指定的工具。

trans-unit.source: If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持一种工具，则它将启用工具箱中这是设计器重新获得焦点时。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.
trans-unit.target: 后一种工具被标记为启用或禁用它无法再次查询。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to test for toolbox support.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>要测试其工具箱支持。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应在工具箱; 上启用该工具<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定组件的设计器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>要与设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the set of properties the component will expose through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 调整的组件将通过公开的属性集<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter>接口方法重写将添加一个非可浏览设计时仅`boolean`名"TrayLargeIcon"为此设计器的组件，在设计时属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter>

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 组件栏使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含对该组件所属的类的属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> that indicates a particular view technology.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref> ，该值指示特定的视图技术。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示此设计器的视图的对象。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 支持的阵列<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The component to filter the attributes of.
trans-unit.target: 要筛选的属性的组件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的属性的字典。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果经过筛选的属性集是要缓存;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果筛选服务必须再次查询。

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The component to filter events for.
trans-unit.target: 为筛选器事件的组件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of events that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的事件的字典。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered events is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果经过筛选的事件集是要缓存;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果筛选服务必须再次查询。

trans-unit.target: 为筛选器属性的组件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of properties that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改的属性的字典。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered properties is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.

trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser>接口。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to be tested for toolbox support.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>工具箱支持要测试。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool is supported by the toolbox and can be enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer does not know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工具箱支持该工具，并可以启用;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser>接口。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to select.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>选择。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示设计器组件栏是自动排列模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设计器组件栏中自动排列模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示设计器组件栏是否在大图标模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>组件栏设计器是否在大图标模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
